author: developeruche
content:
The report for Ethrex and IPC is ready;

Ethrex's implementation was so highly optimized that the decoupled approach actually outperformed the coupled approach.
Full report: https://hackmd.io/nz8dncoPRY6btL_uOQmWpQ?view#Ethrex-Engine-API-Witness-Generation

Regarding the implementation based on IPC for the transport layer: we first conducted an experiment to ascertain the baseline and expected performance for the Engine API over IPC. We successfully transmitted 500MB of data in less than one second.
FUll report: https://hackmd.io/nz8dncoPRY6btL_uOQmWpQ?view#IPC-Transport-layer


Lighthouse + Ethrex (Engine API over IPC vs. TCP), We tested the Lighthouse and Ethrex implementation using IPC rather than TCP. While this significantly reduced latency overhead—positioning it as potentially the fastest transport method in specific environments—within the current Kurtosis environment, the decoupled flow still outperforms the coupled flow.
Full report: https://hackmd.io/nz8dncoPRY6btL_uOQmWpQ?view#Lighthouse--Ethrex-EngineAPI-over-IPC


I have also detailed some concerns regarding "witness bloat" in blocks, which I found particularly interesting.
https://hackmd.io/nz8dncoPRY6btL_uOQmWpQ?view#Side-Line



The respective codebase link is provided in the report also
